text:
With a 'return to normal' from #COVID19 practically hinging on vaccines, how do you overcome those who are #vaccine hesitant? @SerenaMarsh spoke with @PeterHotez, MD, PhD, to find out in this episode of Track the Vax.
Full episode here: https://t.co/VpLv4rYsqB
#IDtwitter https://t.co/09HXb6plJW
